H0.text: Oven mitts are the best conductor of heat.

H1.text: A metal bowl is the best conductor of heat.

H2.text: A wooden spoon is the best conductor of heat.

H3.text: Rubberâ€‘soled shoes are the best conductor of heat among the options listed.

A4.text: Metals are relatively good conductors of heat, which in metals is transported mainly by the conduction electrons.

A5.text: In colloquial use, materials such as steel alloys are referred to as metals, while others, such as polymers, wood, or ceramics are nonmetallic materials.
